topic: New Zealand fugitive Tom Phillips shot dead; children found after four years.
evaluation: This cluster successfully captures the continuous story of New Zealand fugitive Tom Phillips being shot dead by police, the subsequent search for and discovery of his children, and a reflective summary of their four years on the run. Articles progress chronologically, are strictly relevant, and provide significant, developmental updates. Other articles were de-noised due to being unrelated incidents or forming groups of inadequate size for continuous stories (e.g., the Cobblebank murders had only two connected articles, failing the minimum size requirement).
